name: TreasureHunt (MihaiSimedrea)
description:
~~~~~~~~ ABOUT ~~~~~~~~

- TreasureHunt is a game who combine some categories of games.

- Firstly, it is an adventure game because you can explore a lot and find a bunch of treasures.

- Secondly, the action will capture you in the story of the game.

- The last but not the least thing is that the game is also a puzzle, so you have to find things on the map to complete achievements.

~~~~~~~~ RELEASE DATE ~~~~~~~~

- The game will be released in early 2020.

~~~~~~~~ CONTACT ~~~~~~~~
